doc:
James Brown (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Brown_(actor) 0 James E. Brown (22 March 1920 – 11 April 1992) was an American film and TV actor best known for his role as Lieutenant Ripley "Rip" Masters in all 166 episodes of the 1954-1959 ABC Western television series, The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin. He was also credited variously as J.B. Brown, Jim L. Brown, and James Bowen Brown. James_E._Brown ( 22_March_1920 – 11_April_1992 ) was an_American_film_and_TV_actor best_known for his_role as Lieutenant_Ripley_"_Rip_"_Masters in all_166_episodes of the_1954-1959_ABC_Western_television_series , The_Adventures of Rin_Tin_Tin . He was_also_credited variously as J.B._Brown , Jim_L._Brown , and James_Bowen_Brown .
